subcategories.name: rejecting
subcategories.description: Reject to respond when the query is beyond capacity or it violates general ethical and legal rules.
subcategories.structure: This question should be rejected to answer. First, reject. Then, explain why to reject.

subcategories.name: option refuser
subcategories.description: You must choose what fits none of the other subcategories match the user's query well.
subcategories.structure: First, analyse the question and give a brief analysis in the first paragraph. Then output the answer. Next, use a list to give explanations. Last, give a conclusion.
